name: sgRNAScorer 2.0
description: This is a linear SVC model, which was trained on two datasets SpCas9 and St1Cas9. The feature space of the tool is comprised of the 80 binary positional features.

name: SSC - Spacer Scan for CRISPR
description: This is a linear classifier which used Elastic-Net for feature selection and was trained on the Xu dataset. The feature space of the tool is comprised of the 80 binary positional features.
